name: Christobal RUIZ, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Jeffrey A. Beard, Secretary, Department of Corrections, Appellee

parties: Christobal RUIZ, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Jeffrey A. Beard, Secretary, Department of Corrections, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of November, 2008, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

959 A.2d 298
Christobal RUIZ, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Jeffrey A. Beard, Secretary, Department of Corrections, Appellee.
